review: I cannot use it with windows machines.
author: Zoltan Domotor

review: Living in Mexico there are some things that can only be seen via the internet and this is the perfect way to transfer internet broadcasts to the big screen TV.
author: Paco In Ajijic

review: Once installed it works rather well. Be sure to use the included HDMI extender unless you like silent movies.
author: Maui Tim

review: Great while it works. Starts over-heating so you have to completely unplug it and wait at least a day to be able to get a good 2 - 3 hour use of it again.
author: smon1

review: I was hoping to be able to cast any tab. And thought that I had read all the reviews and it was possible. Nope. Some streaming video is not Chromecast compatible and so I returned it.
author: hildynyc "Road warrior"

review: I love it i was paying 165.00 a mouth for cable tv now 50.00 a mouth for the internet I can watch everything youtube nexflis and more
author: David Reining

review: So easy to use and set up. I love it
author: Pamela B Phelps
